release_note: Add speed button for audioplayer Enhanced send video functionality by adding toggle to send original Added option to hide the status list Plus a lot of bugfixes and performance improvements.
Bugfixes and return of the wallpaper feature.
Display the online status of other users not functional on matrix.org and improved UX design for the new chat page. This release also contains a lot of bug fixes and improvements under the hood.
Lots of bugfixes and an experimental new todo list feature for chats.
Hotfix app crashes on some devices and reset applock does not work.
Minor bugfix release and performance improvements.
Fixes that app lock does not reset after logout
Hotfix for broken applock is blocking the app.
Hotfix for adding a second account not possible.

New option to disable typing notifications. Message performance enhancements. Revamped onboarding screen with SSO as a primary feature. Import export emoji packs via ZIP. Updated chat bubble design and more design tweaks. Login now emphasizes SSO in app registration deprecated in favor of SSO registration. New translations added: Arabic Simplified Chinese Estonian German Indonesian Ukrainian.

Get ready for FluffyChat Version 1.12.0! Connect worldwide with new translations in multiple languages! Experience the sleekness of Flutter 3.10 for smoother performance! Take control with a toggle to mute chat group notifications. Shh! Bug fixes and refinements for a flawless messaging experience! Upgrade now and enjoy the fluffiest chats ever!
Hotfix unable to open some rooms
Fix correct mimetype when downloading files.
Bugfixes performance improvements and the ability to pin messages in a chat.
FluffyChat 1.0.0 fixes a lot of bugs and papercuts improves the design stability and performance and features a new theme switcher.
Start a new chat by scanning a QR code A lot of minor bug fixes and performance improvements
This release adds more functionality for spaces enhances the html viewer adds a brand new video player and brings some improvements for voice messages.
New feature: Share your location with your friends on FluffyChat.
Bug fixes and minor design improvements.
This release introduces stickers and a lot of minor bug fixes and improvements.
FluffyChat 0.34.1 brings performance improvements and more stability.

FluffyChat 0.32.0 targets improved stability and a new onboarding flow where single sign on is now the more prominent way to get new users into the app. This release also introduces a complete rewritten database under the hood based on the key value store Hive instead of sqlite. This should improve the overall stability and the performance of the web version.
Fix a bug regarding push notifications
Updated translations thanks to all translators Fixed a bug where recording voice messages produced broken files
Design improvements Better room alias management Bug fixes Stability improvements
Bugfixes Implement matrix room upgrades New sign in design Better iPad design
Bug fixes Updates translations New global search
Design improvements Bug fixes Stability improvements
